title: Discussion Forum Design for Building an Online Health Science Learning Community

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in health sciences and basic online learning competencies
context.additional_context: A one-week intensive short-term course using mobile devices, with the primary goal of enabling health science professionals to share work-applicable knowledge and foster collaborative learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can form a peer-based community of practice through three structured discussion forums.
Learners can provide constructive feedback on peers' posts at least twice on average in topic-specific discussion forums.
Learners can contribute to community activation by performing core participant roles identified through network analysis at least once.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
